entry.summary:
<!-- 導入 brython.js -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/40423214-w14.js"></script>
<!-- 啟動 brython() -->
<script> window.onload=function(){ brython(1); } </script>
<!-- 以下利用 Brython 程式執行繪圖 -->
<canvas id="plotarea" width="200" height="200"></canvas>
<script type="text/python3"> # 導入 doc from browser import document as doc from browser import console import math
# 準備繪圖畫布 canvas = doc["plotarea"] ctx = canvas.getContext("2d")
# 開始畫直線 for i in range(11): ctx.beginPath() ctx.lineWidth = 5 ctx.moveTo(0,0+i*20 ) ctx.lineTo(200,0+i*20 ) ctx.strokeStyle = "#0000ff" ctx.stroke() for i in range(11): ctx.beginPath() ctx.lineWidth = 5 ctx.moveTo(0+i*20, 0) ctx.lineTo(0+i*20, 200) ctx.strokeStyle = "#FF0000" ctx.stroke()
</script>
<script> window.onload=function(){ brython(1); } </script>
